title: Euro 2008 Uniform Fonts
content: Anyone know who makes the fonts for the Euro 2008 soccer (football) uniforms -- or how they customize them to the country? Some of them are pretty great.
author: clintonite@gmail.com

comments.content:
I hope these help you in some way

[http://www.linotype.com/2710/footbaljerseyfonts.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20120105005300/http:/www.linotype.com/2710/footbaljerseyfonts.html "http://www.linotype.com/2710/footbaljerseyfonts.html")

I hope the Dutch shirt is not among your favourites -- I really don't like the cramped and difficult to read bitmap-like numbers ...

(But it's a gorgeous shade of orange, fortunately.)

For some reason, besides liking the players, I specifically really like the Dutch shirt, and at least the number font -- the letter font is ok. (They are different, right?)  
Anyone know what fonts these are or how they choose them?
nevermind, tomhowe thanks, you hit it on the spot. Apparently the dutch use "toilet paper" numbers and people have said they are very poor uniform numbers, although I think they look pretty rad.
